name: @tamanu/api-client
description: API client for Tamanu Facility Server
author: Beyond Essential Systems Pty. Ltd.

scripts.build: npm run build:src && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:types && dual-pkg dist/mjs dist/cjs
scripts.build:types: tsc --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly --noEmit false && move-dts src dist/cjs dist/mjs
scripts.build-watch: npm run build && concurrently "npm run build:src -- --watch" "npm run build:cjs -- --watch"
